timeline.message: CB-8491 Refactor LdapConfig, LdapConfigWithArchived, KerberosConfig and KerberosConfigWithrchived. Create a base class with all field and create 2 empty implementations. We need this because we added the @Where annotation to the class and this annotation filter the archived records. Our SQL queries used this annotation logic in the repositories (we use the spring method name like SQLs). Safe reasons, I don't want to rewrite these queries
